# 6A

a. 

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
boston <- read_csv("https://emitanaka.org/iml/data/boston.csv")
```

```{r}
library(rsample)
set.seed(123) # For reproducibility
boston_split <- initial_split(boston, prop = 3/4)
```

b.

```{r}
library(rpart)
reg_tree <- rpart(MEDV ~.,
                  data = training(boston_split),
                  minsplit = 5,
                  cp = 0.001,
                  method = "anova")
best_tree <- prune(reg_tree, 
                   cp = reg_tree$cptable %>%
                     as_tibble() %>%
                     filter(xerror == min(xerror)) %>%
                     .$CP)
rpart.plot::rpart.plot(best_tree)
```
c.


```{r}
library(ranger)
rf_mod <- ranger(MEDV ~ .,
                 data = training(boston_split),
                 num.trees = 300,
                 mtry = 5,
                 importance = "impurity")
```

d.

```{r}
library(gbm)
boost_mod <- gbm(MEDV ~ .,
    data = training(boston_split),
    distribution = "gaussian",
    n.trees = 1000,
    shrinkage = 0.05,
    interaction.depth = 1,
    cv.folds = 10,
    verbose = TRUE
    )
```

```{r}
best_n_steps <- gbm.perf(boost_mod)
```

```{r}
boost_best_mod <- gbm(MEDV ~ .,
    data = training(boston_split),
    distribution = "gaussian",
    n.trees = best_n_steps,
    shrinkage = 0.05,
    interaction.depth = 1,
    cv.folds = 10,
    verbose = TRUE
    )
```
